LITB054.title: The Grass is Always Greener
LITB054.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 054 The Grass is Always Greener.mp4
LITB054.description: Overhearing a frustrated Ward muttering about ending up in "the poor house", Beaver wonders what it means to be poor and begins a quest for poor people, making new friends and teaching the whole Cleaver family an important lesson.

DRHI11.title: American Music
DRHI11.description: Alan Freed becomes one of the first radio DJs to broadcast rock 'n' roll, Kris Kristofferson gets his big break with some help from his hero, Johnny Cash, and Sylvia Robinson creates The Sugarhill Gang. Featuring Johnny Knoxville, Jack McBrayer and Retta.

SPRA21.title: The Fastest Car on Earth (part 2)
SPRA21.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 21 The Fastest Car on Earth (part 2).mp4
SPRA21.description: Speed is crippled with a fear of driving after one round in the GRX. Can he pull himself back together in time for his next race?

OFUK11.title: Charity
OFUK11.description: It's the annual comic relief day fund raiser at the office and the employees are up to their usual silliness. Tim raises money from his mates by playing a prank on Gareth. Dawn is selling kisses at reception and the bashful Tim buys one.

ACGS11.path: ../All Creatures Great and Small/All Creatures Great and Small - 11 Many Happy Returns.m4v
ACGS11.title: Many Happy Returns

LITB053.title: Wally's Present
LITB053.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 053 Wally's Present.mp4
LITB053.description: Feeling slighted for not being included in Wally's birthday party plans, Beaver takes buddy Larry Mondello's advice, buys himself an expensive bow and arrow set and gives his big brother a cheap gift.

GODZ06.title: Invasion of Astro-Monster
GODZ06.path: ../Kaiju (Giant Monsters)/Invasion of Astro-Monster (Godzilla #6, Monster Zero, 1965, dubbed).m4v

CSMS01.title: Shores of the Cosmic Ocean
CSMS01.description: Carl Sagan examines our planet's place in the universe by leading us on a journey from Earth to Deep Space.

CADF12.title: The Potters Field
CADF12.description: A year after Brother Ruald answers his vocation and becomes a monk at Shrewsbury, a body, believed to be his deserted wife, is unearthed near his cottage.

SOKO11.title: The Terrifying Sand Creature
SOKO11.description: The underground office of the South Pole Unicorn Branch is buried in red sand which suddenly started to gush out in the ice field. As the communications are cut off, Azuma sends Daisaku and Ninami there to see what happened.

LITB052.title: Happy Weekend
LITB052.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 052 Happy Weekend.mp4
LITB052.description: Ward takes his reluctant family to a mountain cabin, hoping to relive rustic childhood memories, and, although things don't turn out exactly as he plans, the boys are soon making memories of their own.

RT66022.title: Eleven, the Hard Way
RT66022.description: Tod and Buz, driving through Nevada, help protect the bankroll of two men who are from the dried up mining town of Broken Knee. The two men are heading to Reno to try to win enough money at the craps table to fund a project which can save the town. Later in Reno, Tod and Buz end up lending moral and financial support.

LRSS11.title: The Warmth Episode
LRSS11.path: ../Larry Sanders Show, The/Larry Sanders Show, The - 11 Warmth.m4v
LRSS11.description: After market research shows that audience members don't find him likable, Larry goes out of his way to be nice to everyone and asks Artie to run the show by focus groups.

PATV10.title: The Interrogation
PATV10.path: ../Planet Of The Apes (Television)/Planet Of The Apes TV 10.mp4
PATV10.description: When Burke is captured by Urko's soldiers, he is forced to face two equally horrifying options: he can either be killed, outright, by Urko; or he can be used in a brainwashing experiment, being performed by a prominent ape doctor, using a forbidden (human) text on the subject.

BSG111.title: Fire in Space
BSG111.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 12 - Fire In Space.m4v
BSG111.description: The crew of the Galactica struggle to fight massive fires on board caused by Cylon suicide incendiary attacks.

ICLD11.title: Fool's Luck
ICLD11.description: Claudius accepts the crown and spares all the conspirators except Cassius for killing Caligula's wife and family.

LITB051.title: The Visiting Aunts
LITB051.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 051 The Visiting Aunts.mp4
LITB051.description: The Cleaver boys' Saturday afternoon carnival plans are disrupted when June's Aunt Martha comes for an unexpected visit.

RT66021.title: Effigy in Snow
RT66021.description: Tod and Buz travel to Squaw Valley, California for "some work and some fun". They barely settle in on their new jobs at the Squaw Valley Ski Lodge when the dead body of a female skier is found out on the slopes. The perpetrator, a mentally defective guest at the lodge, goes undetected and may seek another victim.

LISP54.title: The Colonists
LISP54.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 54 The Colonists.m4v
LISP54.description: A female alien meets the Robinsons and uses them to help erect an arch to bring her people to colonize the Robinsons' planet.

FWLT11.title: The Anniversary
FWLT11.description: Basil plans a surprise anniversary party for Sybil but, thinking he's forgotten it again, she walks out just before the guests arrive.

MSTK0111.title: Moon Zero Two
MSTK0111.description: The crew stages their own moon landing pageant as they watch the film Moon Zero Two (1969) about an astronaut hired to capture an asteroid made of sapphires.

LISP53.title: Revolt of the Androids
LISP53.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 53 Revolt of the Androids.m4v
LISP53.description: In the second of two sequels to 'The Android Machine', Verda's sheltered by the Robinsons after she's marked for destruction by the Celestial Department Store. To that end, the store dispatches a killer android: IDAK (Instant Destroyer And Killer).

ULTR10J.path: ../Ultraman (Japanese, Engligh Subtitled)/Ultraman - 10 The Mysterious Dinosaur Base.mp4
ULTR10J.title: The Mysterious Dinosaur Base

ULTR22.title: Overthrow the Surface
ULTR22.description: Survivors of an underground and ancient civilization come to the surface of Earth with the intent of taking control of Ultraman.

LISP52.title: Treasure of the Lost Planet
LISP52.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 52 Treasure of the Lost Planet.m4v
LISP52.description: In this quasi-sequel 'The Sky Pirate', Will's reunited with Captain Tucker, who along with his crew are searcing for a legendary lost treasure. The key to finding the booty is a metallic talking head in a box.

LITB055.title: The Boat Builders
LITB055.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 055 The Boat Builders.mp4
LITB055.description: Wally's homemade boat capsizes with Beaver on board.

RBBT14.title: On the Orient, North
RBBT14.path: ../Ray Bradbury Theater/Ray Bradbury Theater - 14 On the Orient, North.m4v
RBBT14.description: A nurse accompanies a "dying" ghost on a train ride across Europe to Great Britain in search of a place of refuge where people still believe in the supernatural.

ULTR21.title: Breach the Wall of Smoke
ULTR21.description: A monster terrorizes a mountain by emitting a poisonous gas. Luckily for the Science Patrol, the monster has a vulnerable spot on its back.

STAN11.title: The Terratin Incident
STAN11.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 11 The Terratin Incident.m4v
STAN11.description: Exposed to spiroid epsilon waves, the Enterprise crew begins to shrink in size. If a way can not be found to stop their condition, they will soon be too small to control the ship.

FETM10.title: Galileo Was Right
FETM10.path: ../From the Earth to the Moon/From the Earth to the Moon - 10 Galileo Was Right.m4v
FETM10.description: The Apollo 15 astronauts and backup crew go through extensive geology training in preparation for their mission.

LISP51.title: The Cave of Wizards
LISP51.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 51 The Cave of Wizards.m4v
LISP51.description: Shortly before lift-off, Dr. Smith discovers a cave inhabited by devices, which are the remnants of a once-mighty civilization; the Draconians. As the countdown draws near, Dr. Smith falls ever-more-so under the influence of the Draconians.

SPRA22.title: Mach Five vs  Mach Five (part 1)
SPRA22.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 22 Mach Five vs  Mach Five (part 1).mp4
SPRA22.description: Speed is framed for robbery by Mr Cumulus, who has had a duplicate Mach 5 built for his own ends.
